010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013
014
015/**
016 * <p>
017 * This is an implementation of the global thresholder proposed by Otsu [1].
018 * See Sec. 9.1.4 (Alg. 9.4 and 9.3) in [2] for a detailed description.
019 * </p>
020 * <p>
021 * [1] N. Otsu, "A threshold selection method from gray-level histograms",
022 * IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics 9(1), 62-66 (1979).
023 * <br>
024 * [2] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
025 * </p>
026 * @author WB
027 * @version 2022/08/21
028 * 
029 */
030public class OtsuThresholder implements GlobalThresholder {
031        
032        private int[] h = null;
033        private double[] M0 = null;             // table of background means
034        private double[] M1 = null;             // table of foreground means
035        private int N = 0;                              // number of image pixels
036        
037        public OtsuThresholder() {
038                super();
039        }
040        
041        @Override
042        public int getThreshold(int[] hist) {
043                h = hist;
044                int K = h.length;
045                makeMeanTables(h);
046
047                double sigma2Bmax = 0;
048                int qMax = -1;
049                int n0 = 0;
050                
051                // examine all possible threshold values q:
052                for (int q = 0; q <= K-2; q++) {
053                        n0 = n0 +  h[q];                        // # of background pixels for q
054                        int n1 = N - n0;                        // # of foreground pixels for q
055                        if (n0 > 0 && n1 > 0) {         // both sets must be non-empty
056                                double sigma2B =  sqr(M0[q] - M1[q]) * n0 * n1;         // factor (1/N^2) omitted
057                                if (sigma2B > sigma2Bmax) {
058                                        sigma2Bmax = sigma2B;
059                                        qMax = q;
060                                }
061                        }
062                }
063                
064                return qMax;
065        }
066        
067        private void makeMeanTables(int[] h) {
068                int K = h.length;
069                this.M0 = new double[K];
070                this.M1 = new double[K];
071                int n0 = 0;
072                long s0 = 0;
073                for (int q = 0; q < K; q++) {
074                        n0 = n0 + h[q];
075                        s0 = s0 + q * h[q];
076                        M0[q] = (n0 > 0) ? ((double) s0) / n0 : -1;
077                }
078                
079                this.N = n0;
080                
081                int n1 = 0;
082                long s1 = 0;
083                M1[K-1] = 0;
084                for (int q = h.length-2; q >= 0; q--) {
085                        n1 = n1 + h[q+1];
086                        s1 = s1 + (q+1) * h[q+1];
087                        M1[q] = (n1 > 0) ? ((double) s1)/n1 : -1;
088                }
089        }
090}
